name: Delver

skills.name: Necrotic Toxin
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Mark for Death
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 3 turns if the target has a [Heal Reduction] debuff. This debuff cannot be resisted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Finisher
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking. If the target has a [Weaken] debuff, places a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Delver is a champion of Epic rarity and of Attack type
structured_data.name: Delver

default_description: Delver is a epic attack champion from the faction Dark Elves doing spirit damage
lore: Known only as the “Delver”, this mysterious Dark Elf female has been selling her skills as an assassin and master poisoner for many years. With her mind as sharp as the quarrels of her crossbow, she excels at taking advantage of and multiplying her victims’ weaknesses. And though her origins are not known, some speculate that the moniker was earned by her ceaseless interest to old Elven ruins scattered across the continent. No one knows what she seeks there, but those unfortunate souls brave or foolish enough to assist her expedition for coin are rarely heard from again.
